mdRecord.dcterms:title: Langres
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map (4 sheets) : col. ; each 43 x 69 cm. on sheet 53 x 73 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. [original]

Variant issue of the Langres sector (Sheet 99) of a topographic map of France, printed in four sheets. Library has northwest sheet only. Original publication details assumed to be printed in lower margin: Levée par les Officiers du Corps d'Etat-Major, et publiée par le Dépôt de la Guerre en ... [assumed to be on southwest sheet]. Gravée le trait par Thierry, la lettre par Hacq, le figure du terrain par Blacher [on southeast sheet]. [original]

Printed in red at top of northwest sheet: "Carroyage Kilometrique (Projection Lambert)." "A mettre en service a la [blank] Armée a la date du [blank] en remplacement des cartes portant les anciens modes de carroyages" probably appears on the east sheets. [original]
Note in right mid-margin: la Déclinaison magnétique correspond au centre de la feuille et au 1er. janvier 1917. [original]
Sheet number "99" from layout diagram in upper left corner. [original]
A red grid is superimposed over the map. [original]
Library has only the northwest sheet (2 copies), both of which are from the Joseph P. Ast World War I papers, MSS 13905-a. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ast, Joseph Phillip, 1882-1975--Library--Personal copy
World War, 1914-1918--France--Maps, Topographic
